author: illusions2020
name: Naughty Angel
description:
NB: The version uploaded here is for Cinnamon 1.6 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

This is my first cinnamon theme made with National Breast Cancer Awareness Month in mind

 

This theme fetures some purple and pink for a little naughty and nice contrast.

 

 

Sorry in advance for any errors I am pretty new at this. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 

Changelog:

11/02/2012-->   4.0 Fix text colors and border in search field icon now show correct. Check box is now used not on and off switchs. New Scroll Bar Handel. 

10/20/2012 -->  3.0 Removed grey in borders around run dialog and expo work space fixed some errors i made in css and more polish.  

10/16/2012 -->  2.0 (radio buttons, checkboxes,  have been updated)

10/12/2012 -->  1.0 First Attempt

 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 
Installation Instructions:
 
Extract the zip file to the themes directory i.e. "~/.themes/" or "/usr/share/themes/"
 
Use Cinnamon Settings to choose the theme, or run the following commands in Terminal,
 
gsettings set org.cinnamon.theme name "Naughty_Angel"
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
